summary: Full testing of RF Visualizer features: Badge hidden, under-driven warning, take-off angle visualization. All requested features working correctly.
passed_tests: Badge hidden: #emergent-badge not visible (CSS display:none, visibility:hidden, opacity:0)
Under-driven warning in Equipment Rack: Shows 'UNDER-DRIVEN — 5% drive (50W / 912W needed)' with data-testid='under-driven-warning' for Cobra 29 + 2-pill driver + 16-pill final
Under-driven warning on Canvas: Shows 'UNDER-DRIVEN AMP' with drive ratio info
Under-driven NOT showing: Stryker 955 + 4-pill driver + 4-pill final shows no warning (correct behavior)
Take-off angle visualization: Mini side-view box in bottom-right showing 'TAKE-OFF' with angle display (25°)
Backend /api/calculate returns under_driven, drive_ratio, drive_watts, ideal_drive fields correctly
Dashboard loads with 3 panels: Equipment Rack (left), Canvas Visualizer (center), Controls (right)
Metrics panel shows all 6 metrics: Power, Peak, SWR, Voltage, Take-Off, Hold
Mobile tab bar visible and functional without badge obstruction
Badge hidden on mobile view as well
seed_data_creation: Admin user pre-seeded with admin123 password
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 requested features verified working: 1) #emergent-badge hidden via CSS, 2) Under-driven warning appears when drive ratio < 0.6 (amber warning in Equipment Rack and on canvas), 3) Take-off angle visualization in bottom-right corner of canvas. Backend API correctly returns under_driven, drive_ratio, drive_watts, ideal_drive fields.
